marklogic.body: Why don't you split the country up? Palin would be a good president of the country of Alaska. I'm sure there is a state with independence ambitions that deserves and desires Santorum for president. It would solve many problems. You could keep the FBI and federal tax out and you can keep your trunk-gun sale parties everywhere, in any one of the GOP-governed countries. You can even create your own currencies and Ban the word 'dinosaur' from all new books and Burn the old ones. Every rich GOPper for president, even the double-digiters!
